content:
This chunk is part of a table listing commonly used Panda3D configuration variables in the Config.prc file, specifically describing how to set up graphics rendering by defining primary and fallback display systems (load-display and aux-display).

Variable Values Default Details load-display pandagl pandadx9 pandadx8 p3tinydisplay pandagl Specifies which graphics GSG to use for rendering (OpenGL, Direct3D
8/9 or TinyPanda software rendering) aux-display pandagl pandadx9 pandadx8 p3tinydisplay pandagl Specifies which graphics GSG to use if the GSG specified in
load-display fails; May be specified multiple times to create multiple
